title: Jessica Biel wins Halloween as she rocks NSYNC-era Justin Timberlake costume
text:
Jessica and Justin were joined by friends who completed the NSYNC lineup (Picture: Getty)

Jessica Biel has won Halloween this year with her choice of costume: husband Justin Timberlake.

But forgoing Justin’s sharp and chic 21st century looks, the star instead opted for the curly-haired JT of old… complete with metallic onesie.

The actress was joined at the LA party by friends who dressed as Justin’s former NSYNC band mates JC Chasez, Chris Kirkpatrick, Joey Fatone and Lance Bass. It’s like the 90s all over again!

While the singer attended as a microphone.

And we’re obsessed with it all.

The choice of costume follows an unearthed interview of Jess’s from 1999 in which she admitted she ‘wasn’t a huge fan’ of NSYNC.

Justin as a microphone. Inspired. (Picture: Getty)

When asked by Jimmy Fallon on his talk show earlier this week whether she’s since memorised any NSYNC lyrics, she replied: ‘I only know three words: “Bye, Bye, Bye” which is one word three times’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

She explained her beau ‘coached me through the verse and chorus, I was looking at the words and it was humiliating’.

We’re guessing the amazingly retro outfit is her way of saying sorry?!

Paris Hilton wore lingerie to the event, which took place in Beverly Hills (Picture: Getty)

Other celebrity attendees at the Casamigos Halloween Party in Beverly Hills included Paris Hilton and Lisa Rinna.

Socialite Paris donned lingerie to the event – because, why not?

What we wouldn’t give to see J.Lo’s response to Lisa’s costume! (Picture: Backgrid)

Meanwhile, Real Housewives star Lisa also channeled a bygone era as she went as Jennifer Lopez in the iconic Versace gown she wore in the year 2000, and looked pretty incredible.

The dress of course caused a stir when J.Lo wore an updated version for a Versace fashion show earlier this year.

description: Jessica Biel dressed as her husband Justin Timberlake in his NSYNC days for a Halloween party also attended by Paris Hilton and Lisa Rinna.
